abstract: University of Minnesota athletic director Norwood Teague resigns after two female co-workers accuse him of sexual harassment; apologizes for sending 'inappropriate texts' and says he will seek help for alcohol problem.
lead_paragraph: Norwood Teague was accused by two female co-workers of groping them and sending lewd text messages.

headline.print_headline: Minnesota Athletic Chief, Accused of Harassment, Resigns

snippet: Norwood Teague was accused by two female co-workers of groping them and sending lewd text messages.
